choices: Sebastian
Jimmy
TJ
Ken
Your Choice
1.content:
You can start with the following 4 guys OR create your own with option 5!

1.
Name: Sebastian Rivera
Age: 27
Height: 6'0"
Weight: 500 lbs
Ethnicity: Mexican
Personality: Sebastian, or "Seb", loves to eat. A lot. By day he works as a construction worker for an upscale building firm but he moonlights as a professional eater. He has a few speed eating and quantity eating championship awards that he is quite proud of. He's also really outgoing and energetic, loving to have fun and play around with the guys and his friends. But he also loves to squash guys- big and small.
Body Type: Pear shaped

2.
Name: Jimmy Rayner
Age: 19
Height: 5'10"
Weight: 340 lbs
Ethnicity: Caucasian
Personality: Jimmy's just started college and was hoping to get on the football team. Though he didn't manage to get on the team in his first year he's training to try and make it this semester. Of course, his love of size and growing may help... or hinder if he gets too big. But he has a cocky attitude and figures he'll just smash the competition- literally if he has to. He does have a good group of friends and even a tutor to help him with his classes though they are a bit intimidated by him at times.
Body Type: Thick/Beefy

3.
Name: TJ Miller
Age: 32
Height: 6'4"
Weight: 620 lbs
Ethnicity: African American
Personality: TJ is an immensely smart guy. He's worked as a researcher at a pharmaceutical lab for a few years now and leads a team of people working on some new mystery drugs that the company is currently testing out. Of course, he does get stuck doing a lot of paperwork all day so he's been at a desk for the past few years steadily growing. He doesn't mind though! If he could just sit on his big butt all day eating and doing the easy stuff while delegating the rest of the stuff he's good to go. Though he can be a bit quiet he does get a secret thrill from using his size against other guys.
Body Type: Evenly Fat

4.
Name: Ken Yamashita
Age: 20
Height: 5'8"
Weight: 150 lbs
Ethnicity: Japanese
Personality: Silly, fun, and energetic, Ken is the youngest member of his family and the smallest. He usually doesn't mind since he's too busy with school functions, studying, and his friends. Though he does kind of get tired of being picked on for being small it actually appeals to him a bit. He's grown to like bigger guys and wonders what it's like to be around ones that aren't his family. His brothers used to wrestle with him when he was younger but now he's really curious about what it'd be like to do such with other big guys. Of course he keeps those feelings to himself since he's quite shy about it.
Body Type: Skinny/Toned

5.
Your choice. Just remember the rules: No endless options.
1.title: And We're Off

choices: The shift bell went off.  Time to go home.
He spotted an odd box on the truck.
His gut rumbled.  Where's the food truck?
He started to feel sick.  Rush to the hospital?
Someone from Megalabs arrived to check on the progress.
11.content:
Sebastian was at his current job site busily hauling a big box of nails across the lot from the supply truck to a group of guys busily working on a wall. The box was heavy but "Seb" was no slouch. When you're a 6' tall, 500 pound behemoth you get used to working hard to push that big body around. In fact, he was quite proud of his body! He had wide hips and a truly massive rear end that stuck out as two twin globes of immense fat and strength. Below that were his powerfully thick thighs that were well muscled enough to crack a walnut but so fat that that walnut would likely get lost in them first.

"Thanks, Seb," one of the guys said as the big man set the box down. "You got any of them eating contests this weekend?"

Seb chuckled and pushed his huge gut out, "Ehhh we'll see. Been practicing tacos lately. Almost mastered shoving them into my mouth whole if they're soft."

The smaller man laughed and shook his head, "You be careful. You get any bigger and who knows what'll happen."

The titanic Mexican just laughed with him and turned to leave. His big ass bumped the smaller guy, knocking him into a sawhorse on accident. He grumbled good-naturedly and Seb just laughed more. Pushing small guys around was something he enjoyed. Using his huge body to dominate made him happy in several ways and he had to admit that seeing it grow was one of the best things in his life. In fact, he now had to get his pants and underwear specially made for him. His tailor had to use two tape measures now that his ass had swollen past 80 inches. The last time he had worn pants from a normal store had been a pair from the Big & Tall that he tore when he bent over to pick up a pack of cookies he had dropped one afternoon. Then his final pair, a huge pair of sweats, gave up on him when he went to his current tailor for an emergency fix.

Today he could barely focus on the job. It was Friday and he was ready to get home and get to eating. Maybe he'd see if there were any eating contests around. He was a local champ and had proven himself to be a minor celebrity in the competitive eating circuit in the area. If there weren't any then he'd probably just get as much food as he could and chow down to try and increase his capacity. But there was work to do.

He went back to the supply truck and checked a packing slip to make sure they had everything. "Megalabs Building 3" it read in the handwriting of the foreman. Megalabs was some lab based in town that was working on a bunch of supplements and pharmaceuticals but Seb didn't know too much about them other than that. This was going to be a new building for them as they'd outgrown their other 2 labs as a result of their expansion from all the sales they'd been doing.

That's when...
11.title: Sebastian

choices: Seb hurries home after work to try the supplement.
Seb goes out with friends and forgets the supplement until later.
Someone catches Seb at his car.
112.content:
That's when he spotted an odd box on the truck. It had different markings than the others so Seb leaned into the truck to pull out the box. He grunted as he leaned over his gut and slid the box a bit with his thick fingers. It scooted close enough to grab so he pulled it out and propped it up on its side on the truck bed. It wasn't that big- maybe the size of the average box from some online store. The sides of it were plain and the only indication of what it was for was on the shipping label.

"Megalabs Building 3". The same place they were building. Whoever had sent it must have done so by mistake since Building 3 was nowhere near done. Shrugging, Seb picked it up in his big hands and started to rumble himself to the office to turn it in. Though as he waddled along he could hear something in the box rattling. Almost as if a bunch of stuff was in a bottle. His brown eyes darted around the construction site and realized that no one else was looking his way. He stuck his fat fingers under a flap and gave a tug, tearing the whole flap right off.

"Don't want to turn this in if it's a bomb or some shit," he mumbled to himself.

The rattling continued as the box shifted in his hand and he had discovered the source after the item rolled to the side with the missing flap. It was a bottle! It had a shiny, obnoxious label like most supplements had on them. It wasn't that big of a bottle really. Maybe the size of a vitamin bottle if that. The shiny blue and silver label had big block letters on it: "MegaG.R.O.W.: The new formula for Gaining Rapidly Over Weeks. Helps increase your bulk when paired with a healthy diet and workout regimen."

"What the hell," Seb said under his breath, turning the bottle over in his hand.

Instructions and supplement facts filled the rest of the label. Continuing to read it he found that it was only to be taken 1 pill at a time with no more than max 2 pills in a day. There was a list of side effects like weight gain and- well, Seb stopped there. Weight gain as a side effect? He scanned the area again to see if anyone had noticed him yet. Seeing no one he quickly ditched the box in the recycling bin and went to his car to hide the bottle.
112.title: He spotted an odd box on the truck.

choices: He eats everything but is still hungry.
Someone knocks at the door and interrupts his meal.
He ends up full and starts growing again.
1121.content:
Written with http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/vi...

At the end of the day Seb hurried home without saying much to the others at the work site. He was more concerned with the weird supplement he had found than with chatting or going out with the guys. There was something about it that made him really want to try it. Maybe because it could make him grow but he was a bit worried that it was all a hoax. Stuff like this never really worked. As he squeezed into the car, he looked at the supplement a few more times and decided to give it a chance as he placed it in the glove box and drove home.

When he arrived home he went to his kitchen and set the jug down on his counter. The maximum amount of pills he could take for a day was 2. After unscrewing the large top he reached in and pulled out a handful of them.

"Hmm... I'm sure taking more than 2 would be okay..." he said, looking at the list of side effects but seeing that there weren't any that seemed too serious.

He decided to throw caution in the wind and placed the handful of pills in his mouth, swallowing them down with a glass of water.

"There we go. Now we'll see if anything actually happens," he laughed. "May as well take a nap for now."

He went toward his bedroom and lay down on the bed with a loud yawn. Once his eyes closed he drifted off to sleep and started to snore. As he slept his body absorbed the massive amount of supplement which began to react in a rather extreme way. As he slept, his stomach let out a loud groan as it started swelling outward. His thighs, ass, arms and chest following. The bed started to creak and groan under his body as it grew and grew. His clothes had grown tighter around his thick body but he just kept snoring. Love handles spread out and stretched toward the edges of the bed now. As he kept growing, a familiar pressure was felt in his rear until a loud fart was released, though muffled under all the swelling fat.

"Ahhh..." Seb groaned as he awoke from his nap.

He fanned the air a bit as he realized he had farted in his sleep. Looking at his bedside clock he yawned and decided to get up to start dinner. Though as he tried to roll out of bed he suddenly felt a great weight on him. His vision focused and he looked down to see a vast belly spread out before him.

"Oh man, it actually worked!" Seb exclaimed as he lifted his arms and began to feel and grope his new fat with pleasure. His hands giving his giant gut a slap as it gurgled and jiggled. Seb leaned to the side a bit on his bed, causing it to creak loudly. A loud fart rumbled out of him and into the room, causing the air to grow thick and warm. "Damn, my body's not the only thing that grew. I guess I really do need to hurry and eat... I'm starving."

Seb then began rocking his giant body back and forth till he got the momentum to get his thick legs of the bed and with a loud thud got them on the floor.

"I gotta weight 700, maybe 800 pounds now! I can't believe this!" he said as he got up off the bed with a grunt.

He waddled to his kitchen and could feel and hear the floor shake under his feet. His huge size filled his hallway and a big smile crept onto his face as he felt his sides brush the walls.

"Now... what to eat..."

Seb reach the fridge and opened the door, the cold air felt great against his giant flesh as he eyed the food deciding what to eat. It was as his stomach let out a massive groan did he decide.

"Everything," He thickly said with hunger.
1121.title: Seb hurries home after work to try the supplement.

choices: His stomach growls again.
His doorbell rings!
11213.content:
Written with: http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/vi...

Seb started to grab food out of his fridge and set it out on his table. Then he pulled whatever was in his pantry and cabinets out and spread it out as well. He licked his lips and took a seat so he could begin eating. He had never been so hungry before. All the food looked so good and it didn't take him long to start stuffing his face. As he ate, the food quickly disappeared in a blur as it entered his mouth. Seb only stopped eating to belch, which splattered the remain of food from his mouth on to his belly, or when he want to enjoy a big, long fart.

"Oof... this is a lot," he said to himself as he ate. "But it's so good..."

Eventually he was licking wrappers clean of crumbs and was finally realizing how full he was. The floor was littered with wrappers and empty containers as he had tossed them there as he ate. Seb let out a slow, deep belch as he rubbed his full belly. In fact, he kept rubbing his large, sweaty belly until he heard a low groan erupt from it.

"Oh, don't tell me you're still hungry?" He said to his gut.

His stomach groan in response but Seb quickly realized this wasn't about hunger and as he leaned to the side to release a rank fart, he began to feel a familiar warmth surround him. He was growing again. Seb's body began to expand in all directions rather quickly so that his gut ended up bumping into the table. The chair under him started to creak and groan as it grew closer to breaking. He held the sides of his belly as it expanded wider, not even noticing that he was getting a little bit taller. It wasn't too much though. Seemingly just enough for him to support his new weight. As he kept growing, his attention was focused on his growing belly as he kneaded the sweaty, swelling flesh. This was short lived for Seb heard a crunch noise followed by a loud thud as he landed on the floor, shaking both the house and his still growing body.

"Damn..." Seb said in his husky voice. "I got kind of big..."

He sat on the floor of his kitchen and looked around at himself. His huge body had cracked the floor tiles under him so now there were spidering streaks running out from under him. With his huge, doughy belly rolling over his knees and sagging onto the floor he smiled. Sitting down he was probably as tall as he had been when this all started.

He leaned to his side as a loud fart escaped from his massive ass. Seb inhaled and chuckled at the large slob he was becoming. As he laid back into place rubbing his gut? He began to think of what would happen if he got hungry again.
11213.title: He ends up full and starts growing again.

choices: Seb drives to the Mexican Restaurant
Seb drives to the Chinesse Buffet
Seb goes for pizza
1123.content:
After taking a good look around the parking lot, Seb opened his car door and forced the upper half of his bulk in between the steering wheel and driver's seat. He took another look at the mysterious bottle and began to think about how the extra mass and weight will help him in his eating competitions. Lost in his thoughts he didn't notice someone slowly walking up behind him. Still oblivious Seb was just about to drop the bottle in a compartment when he heard a throat being cleared behind him. Seb shifted his body to see who was behind him but his view was blocked by his titanic ass. A knock on the passenger side window startled him and he quickly looked up to see his co-worker Mike smiling back at him.

"Better be glad I found you out here snacking instead of the foreman." Mike quipped as he straightened back up to face a rising Seb.

"Why does everyone assume I sneak out here to eat?" the hefty Mexican asked knowingly.

Mike chuckled and shrugged, "I don't know, maybe you should ask the five guys you're smuggling in your belly.".

The large man unconsciously rubbed his gut, "Ha ha very funny Mikey. You know there's always room for one more in there."

The two talked on for another five minutes about their plans for the evening and how they should get back to work before anyone notice they're missing. Just as they were about to head back Seb remembered the bottle. Despite his size, he swiftly turned and leaned back into the car. Without any thoughts of consequence he pops open the bottle and shakes a little green pill into his palm.

"Here goes nothing.", he mutters to himself as he raises his palm to his mouth and drops the pill on his tongue and swallows.

"Are you coming or not, Seb?", yells Mike a few dozen steps back towards the job site.

Seb takes a swig of luke-warm water left in an old bottle laying in the car floor. After letting out a quick burp, he hides the bottle under the seat and pushes himself out the car door. With a slight smile on his face he closes the door and jogs up beside his co-worker who's waiting at the work site entrance.

Work went on as usual as no one seemed to notice the two workers disappearing or an unusual box missing. Even Seb was beginning to forget about the mysterious bottle and the pill he consumed as it was getting closer to lunch time. At noon everyone stopped what they were doing and headed into the break area to eat. While most workers came equipped with a small lunchbox and a drink, Seb carried a huge cooler filled with food. With a huge smile on his face and huge belly growling in hunger the large man made his way to the break area.

In no time flat a pile of bags and empty wrappers lay in waste around the gluttonous behemoth. Lunch had barely gotten underway and the large man had torn through an impossible amount of food. Still unsatisfied the large man rubbed his rumbling belly before checking his watch. 50 soft tacos in 12 mins 53 seconds. "Still not under 10 minutes.", he muttered under his breath, "Gotta be quicker than that." A large belch erupted out of his mouth roaring through the break area. Still feeling a bit of discomfort he leaned slightly and released a thunderous fart that incited a crowd of groans from his co-workers as they are covered in a foul fog.

"Damn it Seb, can we get through one lunch without you trying to suffocate us?", grumbled one of the guys through his hand covered mouth.

The big man chuckled and patted his distended stomach. He has never been shy about sharing his gas. Always living by the motto: "It's better out than in". Since he started doing eating contest his gas has grown in proportion to his appetite meaning he never lack either one. Feeling a big one building up he rocks himself forward lifting his two blubberous globes off the bench and pushed out a long, sputtering 20 second blast of seismic proportions. "Aaaaaaah!", he moaned in relief.

In one fell swoop he cleared the break area. His co-workers left half eaten sandwiches and some untouched goodies in search of fresh air, some yelling out profanities in the process. Largely unaffected by his own stench, he takes a deep whiff before spying a bag of chocolate chip cookies left unattended. In one swift motion he leaned and grabbed the package.

"I'm sure he won't mind me eating these since I'm sure he lost his appetite.", the greedy glutton quipped before opening the bag and shoveling them into his open maw.

The rest of the work day went like normal with Seb unloading boxes stopping occasionally to left a leg and rip a fart. He's always had a good amount of gas after eating but today was off the charts. He wasn't too concerned chalking it up to all the tacos he had. Plus his mind was still focused on his after work activities. It was a pretty uneventful day until the whistle blew for end of shift. After lumbering to his car a yell from Mike grabbed his attention.

"Stupid piece of...Aaaaah!" the small man kicked at the tire in frustration while fanning away the cloud of smoke blooming from under the hood. He noticed Seb standing by his car. "Hey Seb, can I get a ride man?"

"Yeah, sure man.", he slid his body into the driver seat groaning as the steering wheel dug slightly into his belly. He unlocked the passenger side and waited as Mike entered the car.

"Thanks big guy, you're a life saver." the smaller man said as he reached to pull on his seat belt. "Stacy is picking up Cody from school since my car is out of commission so how about I treat you to a meal..."small" meal as appreciation for the ride."

"And just how small is "small" exactly?", the beefy driver asked as he pulled out the work site.

Mike laughed and shook his head, "I have a wife and kid at home, I doubt I could afford to feed you too. Other than work all you seem to do is eat." he poked the massive belly beside him causing Seb to release a rumbling fart. "Oh, yeah.... you do that too." he groaned quickly rolling the window down before the scent covered him.

"Oof, sorry man. Been extra gassy all day.", Seb noted as he rubbed his stomach with his free hand. "Guess I'm making room for this meal you're about to provide hehe and I know just the place."
1123.title: Someone catches Seb at his car.

choices: Seb starts to grow while he eats...
The manager starts yelling at Freddy for some reason.
11231.content:
Seb pulled out of the job site and drove down the street toward town. He and Mike chit chatted in the car while Seb's gut churned. Something was giving him a bit of gas but he tried to ignore it. The car would fill with stink each time he ripped one without a care. Even though Mike groaned and yelled at him, the two couldn't help but laugh. Finally they pulled up to the restaurant Seb had planned on going to. "La Casa". A Mexican restaurant with several large portions cooked like they're straight from a home kitchen.

"Seriously, Seb?" Mike asked, looking at the man. "You're gassy enough and you want Mexican?!"

Seb just shrugged with a grin and Mike got out of the car, rolling his eyes. As he shut the door Seb saw the bottle of pills roll out from under the seats. Maybe that's what gave him the gas? It sure did seem to affect his appetite so he decided that he should try it again just to see how much he could get out of Mike. He picked up the bottle and shook out a couple more pills, gulping them down with some of the water. The bottle had said not to take more than two a day but he'd never had side effects do anything to him before and he knew it was just some warning they put on it for lightweights. With a grunt he pushed himself out of the car with a quick, loud fart.

"Whoops," he chuckled, his gut growling.

He shut and locked the door and went inside the building. The dining room wasn't too full since it was still early but it held a fair amount of people. The hostess smiled at him as she got menus for him and Mike, leading them to a table at the far end of the room even though several other tables were still open. Seb carefully lowered his ass down onto the chair, the massive globes hanging off the sides and compressing the cushion down immensely.

"Why're we sitting all the way over here?" Mike asked, looking at Seb over his menu.

Seb chuckled deeply and pat the side of his gut, "I've been here before. You were in the car with me. That should let you know."

"I highly doubt just sticking you here does much to help everyone else," Mike joked.

"Eh, not my problem," Seb said as he looked down the list of food.

A waiter came by shortly and smiled, patting Seb on his wide back.

"Seb! Good to see you, man! You here to train or what?" asked a thin, 20-something young Mexican man with short, messy hair and a hint of a goatee growing in.

Seb looked up from his menu at the kid. His name was Freddy and he was attending the local college for hotel and restaurant management. Previously he had told Seb he wanted to start his own restaurant and wanted Seb to be there when he did. The kid had a lot of courage and even though he hadn't been given a chance to be promoted past waiter at the restaurant. Still, Seb knew he'd end up going far.

"Nah, just here to eat with my bud. He's paying."

"Shit, are you loaded, dude?" Freddy asked, laughing.

Mike rolled his eyes, "No, just stupid."

Seb grinned and started rattling off an order. 4 orders of tacos, 4 quesadillas with varying meats, 3 burritos, 2 orders of chili colorado, full sized sides on each meal, 3 bowls of chicken and rice soup, and a nice, tall soda. Mike on the other hand got a simple burrito and a soda. This just caused the blimp to snort in playful derision. The two continued to chat about work as they waited for the food but Seb couldn't stop rubbing his gut. It was rumbling with hunger and he knew he felt more gas swelling up. Something in those little pills sure was strong and he wasn't sure if taking 3 was such a good idea. If he got sick, he got sick though. No sense in worrying about what ifs.

Then the food started coming out.
11231.title: Time for Mexican food!

choices: They search the kitchen for food
They search the city for food
112311.content:
Multiple trays full of plates piled high with food were brought over by several of the staff. Suddenly it made since why two patrons were placed at such a large table in the back. A few of the customers up front looked on in amazement at the feast that could feed two large families sitting in front of the two men. One by one as the plates were placed on the table, their delicious aromas swirled around Seb. He licked his meaty lips in anticipation not knowing where he wanted to start while Mike admired the hefty burrito placed before him. The tortilla monstrosity filled the entire plate and bulged obscenely in the middle.

"Ho-ly shit, this thing is HUGE.", Mike gasped as he lifted the massive dish after a bit of effort.

Seb, who had at the moment just finished effortlessly polishing off two plates of tacos, chuckled in amusement. One of La Casa's burritos wouldn't even be a snack to the big glutton. He was even doing his pal a favor by not ordering enough food to even come close to being full. Those two plates of tacos had only whetted his appetite for more. He unabashfully pulled his plate of 3 massive burritos in front of him and quickly went to devouring them as his co-worker watched in wide eyed amazement. A long brassy belch signaled the burritos defeat.

Seb chuckled while patting his gut, "Ummmm, I bet could eat a dozen more of those."

Mike took a good look at his barely touched burrito, " I'm sure ass hell not going to take you up on that. You'll probably end up with most of kitchen sitting in that big belly of yours."

Seb rolled his eyes before another massive belch roared through the restaurant. A feeling of discomfort hit him hard and heavy. He hadn't eaten nearly enough to have any serious heartburn. He figured it was just a bit of gas and it'd soon pass. He slowly sipped his soda while watching Mike pick at his burrito. Just watching someone else eat pushed his hunger into overdrive. Even with some slight discomfort he kept up the small talk while shoveling more and more food in his mouth. Soon half his order was gone but the discomfort was steadily intensifying. Even Mike started to notice Seb slowing down.

"Finally had your fill I see.", Mike joked as he motioned to the tower of empty plates and bowls sitting across the table.

Seb closed his eyes and groaned as his stomach rumbled loudly. His already overtaxed chair begins to creek and bow under the large man's weight. Their table is slowly pushed back by his ballooning belly as it expands like rising dough. The straining chair cracks under the growing tonnage and the over sized Mexican crashes on his bulbous butt with a resounding boom. Mike rushes to his friend's side but is forced to back away as Seb's growing body starts to take up more and more space pushing tables and chairs out of it's path. Loud groans and guttural rumbles alerted the other patrons and restaurant staff who immediately begun to flee in terror leaving only Mike and Freddy to watch an ever expanding Seb destroy the dining area..

As quickly as it began the growth subsided. Seb opened his eyes and was taken aback by the destruction before him. He scanned the room searching for his missing friends.

"Mike... Mikey! Where are ya, Mikey?", he yelled into the rubble hoping for an answer.

A hint of movement catches the behemoth's eye as a pile of broken chairs and tables slowly shifts as a small figure emerges. He slowly brushes off some debris while casually checking himself for injuries. It wasn't until the little man determined that he wasn't in any serious medical danger when he noticed the watchful eyes of the enormous Seb.

Stumbling backward into the pile of broken furniture the small took in the sight of the massive Mexican muttering, "This can't be real. This isn't happening. Stay back."

"Freddy... it's me. I'm not going to hurt you.", Seb pleaded.

Still uneasy, Freddy took a deep breath before standing before his gigantic acquaintance. "Just what the hell happened to you anyways."

The big man sighed, " I... I don't know. I was just sitting here with Mike and... Mike! I gotta find Mike!"

Two massive hands tore apart mounds of tables and chairs in an aggressive search for his friend. During his search the gargantuan felt an irritation behind his notoriously large ass. Stopping briefly to relief the pesky itch he reached behind him self the scratch. What he found was his buddy Mike who was struggling to escape his massive ass.

"I know I've told you to kiss my ass before but I never thought you'd actually do it.", Seb managed to say amidst his fit of giggles.

"I was actually kicking not kissing. God, I thought I needed a shower after work before.", Mike waved his hand in front of his face for emphasis.

Seb clenched his stomach and pushed out a thundering fart quickly filling the building with it's noxious scent, "Heh, it could've gotten a lot worst."

Mike and Freddy both coughed and fanned the air as the monumental fart covered them. Seb on the other hand laughed heartily at the small men helplessly struggling to breath through his gas. Once the fumes died down and the three friends had to decide what to do now that one of them was titanic.

Seb sat in silence as the two smaller men debated their next move. It wasn't until his belly rumbled in hunger did the new giant finally speak up.

"Man, I'm starved.", the giant blurted out to the amazement of the two smaller men. "I need to eat, NOW!"

Looking around the trashed restaurant Freddy noted, "The kitchen area doesn't look messed up, maybe we can find something for you to eat in there.".

Mike place his hand against the blubbery belly, "I don't know if there's enough food in here to satisfy this thing.... maybe not anywhere.".

With the growing glutton's belly growling they knew they had to find food immediately.
112311.title: Seb starts to grow while he eats...

choices: He began growing fatter and more dominante.
He stood up as he began growing taller and fatter.
1123111.content:
As Mike and Freddy went to the kitchen to get what they could, Seb sat there in the dining room surrounded by pushed and destroyed furniture. He had plenty of room sitting here like he was but he knew if he stood up he'd probably be brushing or pushing out of the ceiling. With how tall those ceilings were he had to guess he was around 9 or 10 feet tall. Though as he looked down at his body he saw that he was definitely seeing far more acreage in his poundage. When he reached back to check his ass again he suddenly registered how big it was.

The two brown globes had already been impossible to restrain and now they were even bigger. They were round, thick, soft, and clearly powerful as he dug a few pieces of chair from between them. Seb began to think about the few times a guy asked him to sit on him. He had been wary about it at first but soon got used to it, even enjoy it. The feeling of something so small under his huge ass even started to turn him on. Now though... Now he was truly huge. He could sit on a car! A truck even! A grin crept onto his face as he started to feel that surge of dominance.

His big gut grumbled and he gave it a rub. It was a combination of hunger and gas. He knew the feeling well enough to be able to tell that. His thick fingers gave his gut a scratch as he sat there waiting, starting to become impatient. This new size was going to his head now as he realized that the little men were keeping him waiting. He flexed his huge gut again and ripped another bellowing fart that caused the poor restaurant to tremble from the huge sound. The thick fumes plumed into the air and would have made it hard to breathe if he hadn't been so big.

"I'm still hungry out here!" he boomed, the windows rattling. "Hurry up or I'll fart again!"

Bill Terry was the quarterback for the Hogs. He was like most players at his position, handsome, 6'5", big hands, and an arm like a cannon. Unlike other quarterbacks however, he was. 300+ pounds. He didn't let his weight hurt him though, instead he used it to punish defenders. He loved nothing more than smashing a player who was trying to bring him down.

Despite the fact that the team had won, Bill didn't have a great game. He felt off, not only passing, but he didn't get a chance to hit anyone. "Hey there Bill," Keith said, " shame about that last interception. You didn't look so good out there today. Something on your mind?"

That was it. Bill didn't need hear about his poor play from the towel boy.

Henry looked at the list of fraternities still accepting new members. He figured it could help him look more proactive and look more involved on a resume. Though now all that seemed to be left was one full of some rather obnoxious guys around the school. Henry sighed as he headed to the fraternity, a part of him hoping the most of the stories he heard were just over exaggerated. Like the one were the members were huge fat slobs or that their hazing ritual involved being sat on. As he thought of these and various other stories, he had been walking to the frat.

He walked toward the rows of houses where the fraternities sat. There was evidence of parties that had happened the night before on lawns all over the street but Henry ignores it as he looked for the address on the information flyer. Then he spotted a large house with the number he needed. The house was easily the biggest of the frats, the yard littered with kegs and surprisingly wide lawn chairs. As he walked towards the door, he noticed the sides of it were bent as if something, or someone, that was too wide tried being forced through. But he shook this though as he leaned forward and pressed the doorbell.

He heard it ring inside and waited a bit on the front porch. There didn't seem to be anyone at home at first but he didn't want to just give up. He needed this on his list of extracurricular activities even if he didn't want to be here. Sighing, he rang the bell again and heard some heavy, thudding footsteps. After a few seconds of hearing the heavy footsteps come closer, he saw the door open up and standing there was one of the biggest man Henry ever seen. The large man was easily 6ft8 and most of that was fat. Henry got a good view of the mans size for he was wearing only boxers and a football jersey both of which were stretched out.

"Can I help you?" A thick voice shook Henry as he looked up to the mans fat filled face, surprised to see he looked no older than Henry.

"Uh... yeah, I just... I was wondering if I could join up?" Henry asked, shocked.

"Oh, uh, you? You want to join?" the huge guy asked as he scratched his head.

Henry nodded and looked around to see if he could look in past the guy. Though unfortunately the guy filled the doorframe. It was easy to see why it looked so stretched out.

"I guess... We could at least see if you can handle it anyway."

With that the man back up, allowing enough space for Henry to move pass him and closed the door. The first think that hit Henry was the smell of the place, a rank odor that seed to be mix of sweat, farts and something he couldn't name.

"Follow me." The big man said as he began walking into the house, every step shaking the ground lightly as Henry followed. As they walked, Henry noticed things that seemed to suggest just how big the frat members were. The first thing he saw was what he thought was a bed sheet on the bannister of the stairs but as he got closer he saw they were a massive pair of briefs, stretched out completely. The kept walking in, passing more junk and articles of clothing as Henry began to hear what sounded like cheering from the next room.

info.description:
Since there's a complete lack of BHM/gay squashing, ass growth, farting, related fat stories I've decided to try and create one. So this will be a story where it's just about the fellas and all that good stuff. No women, no giantesses, etc. There are dozens of stories about that on here.

Rules:
- Men only
- Slob is fine and preferred but if you're going to do anything out there (scat, etc.) please make note in your chapter title or at the start of the chapter. I don't want to censor anyone but not everyone's into that stuff so please just make note of that
- Vore's okay, just no hard vore/chewing/blood
- Try to keep characters consistent. If you invent someone, try to keep that person going across all threads. Same goes for others observing.
- No chapters of endless choices. There can be a few launchpads at the start of threads but no 30+ chapters with nothing but choices.

Other than that have fun!
